title: This ad film on Diwali starring Deepika Padukone and her parents will make you miss your family
text: This ad film on Diwali starring Deepika Padukone and her parents will make you miss your family Saturday, 17 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) Diwali is meant to be spent with family and this new advertisement featuring Deepika Padukone and her parents gives us the rightest reasons to do so. Deepika Padukone Launches Her NGO Live Love Laugh 01:51 Deepika Padukone is one actress who really puts her money where her mouth is. The actress had recently spoken up about spreading awareness of mental health issues and she has finally kicked off her own NGO - Live Love Laugh. Through this organizations, Deepika seeks to spread awareness about mental... Recent related news This new ad will give you all the feels. You might want to go and hug your family right now. DNA 5 hours ago - Entertainment You Might Like
